text: Wyllyotts Manor Wyllyotts Manor is a public house and restaurant in Potters Bar, England, and a grade II listed building with Historic England. It consists of a late 16th-century barn, possibly built for Robert Taylor between 1594 and 1603, and a house that dates from around 1800. ==References== ==External links== Category:Pubs in Hertfordshire Category:Grade II listed pubs in England Category:Grade II listed buildings in Hertfordshire Category:Potters Bar Category:Timber framed buildings in Hertfordshire
title: Wyllyotts Manor
